description: Reduce the risks of natural disasters and climate change through promoting scientific information, and strengthening national, district and community-level capacity for prevention/ mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: In line with the National Disaster Risk Management Policy, the project will:(1) develop operational systems and mechanisms to strengthen the National Disaster Operations Center and establish two new District Disaster Operations Centers; (2) Support coordination for better preparedness, early warning and response, and (3) Mainstream Disaster Risk Management in Government Planning and raise public awareness on natural hazards.
subproject.title: Disaster Risk Management

subproject.description: The project will focus on four key priorities: (1) undertaking a National Risk and Vulnerability Assessment for informed decision-making; (2) mainstreaming Disaster and Climate Risk Management in public planning; (3) establishing and strengthening institutional and operational mechanisms for the implementation of the National Disaster Risk Management Policy; and (4) expanding community-based disaster risk reduction with special emphasis on promoting women's participation.
subproject.title: National Risk Assessment

subproject.description: The project will focus on four key priorities: (1) undertaking a National Risk and Vulnerability Assessment for informed decision-making; (2) mainstreaming Disaster and Climate Risk Management in public planning; (3) establishing and strengthening institutional and operational mechanisms for the implementation of the National Disaster Risk Management Policy; and (4) expanding community-based disaster risk reduction with special emphasis on promoting women's participation.
subproject.title: National Risk Assessment

title: Disaster Risk Management in Timor-Leste
